to.sven.androidrccar.client.presentation.view

Class BatteryView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • to.sven.androidrccar.client.presentation.view.BatteryView

  • public class BatteryView
extends View
    Draws a battery icon The remaining capacity can set with setChargingLevel(float).
    Author:
    sven

    • Field Summary

      The charging level of the battery in percent (0f-100f).

      Paint for the available capacity.
      private RectF pinRect
      Rectangle of the battery icons plus pin.
      private RectF powerRect
      Rectangle over the available capacity.
